menu_not_yours: This menu isn't yours (However you managed to do this) please report this to a developer!
menu_not_exists: The selected menu doesn't exist (However you got here) please report this to a developer!
account_deleted_success: Your player account was successfully deleted! (Use `/game` to create a new one
language_not_exists: The selected language doesn't exist (That should actually be impossible) please report this to a developer!
start_journey: To start your journey, open a menu by pressing the corresponding button.
town_button_desc: Here you can find the marketplace and the town center.
inventory_button_desc: Manage your inventory items and change your equipment.
traveling_button_desc: Embark on an adventure or farm some ressources.
hut_button_desc: Your little retreat where you can craft items, plant crops and research some magic.
hut_desc: A bit wet and cold but better than nothing.
farming_button_desc: Plant food or different organic ressources.
crafting_button_desc: Craftsmanship is true art. (And usefull for getting better items)
magic_button_desc: Study the stars, predict the future, summon helpers or learn powerfull spells.
items_button_desc: All things you collected (and kept). I hope you will find what you're searching.
equipment_button_desc: Your invincible armor or your small throwing knife. All that is located here.
reset_character_warning: Reseting your character will delete all your player data! This is a irreversible action!
town_title: Go shopping, pray to god or candidate as major.
town_desc: Crowding, crying of the vendors and the smell of sewage. How could you feel unwell.
market_button_desc: Buy what you want from the market vendors, the players standing here or if it's illegal from the strange guy in the dark alley.
main_square_button_desc: Here you find the temple and the town hall.
traveling_desc: Traveling is the most important part of an adventurers life.
adventure_button_desc: Set out for an adventure and come back with valuable treasures ... or not.
woodcutting_button_desc: As leg of a table or the handle of an axe, wood is as on of the simplest ressources also one of the most needed.
fishing_button_desc: If you are patient you can get amazing treasures even as fisherman.
mining_button_desc: For a good weapon you will need something better than wood. Here you find what you're searching.
temple_button_desc: Here adventurers can buy healing potions or magic equipment.
crafting_title: Gather different materials and craft them into new items.
crafting_desc: Depending on the item you want to craft, a different crafting method is required.
smithing_button_desc: Craft items with iron or other ores.
